__e: Melanie, I don't want to hear anymore from you.
I always wanted something that beloned only to me.
Look, Melanie, I barely know you but I like you a lot.
It won't happen again. I'll take Melanie and go.
Melanie and I just wanted you and John to know... how much we appreciate all the help you've given us with the wedding.
So, if you don't have Melanie, and you don't have the egg, then get out of my way!
Hey, listen, I hate to interrupt things, but Melanie is my date.
